Text.Page:
There’s an item that makes any feline purr—a silvervine branch. Now, it's rare and expensive, but absolutely worth the effort.

Bring one of those and we'll have this leopard curled up at your feet in no time.4

Mmm, smells so...divine. I—I want it!

Sorry. Went a little whisker-crazy.

You probably should keep that away from me. I'm working the twelve steps, but each day's a challenge.4
We really need that silvervine branch. It's for your leopard, not me. Honest!
